vendor_name.reason: Top-left header area contains the organization name 'Craigs' Landscaping' directly under the prominent document title 'Invoice'. Visual header placement and font weight indicate vendor name.

vendor_address.reason: Multi-line block beneath the vendor name in the header lists street, city, state and ZIP in expected address format.

vendor_phone.reason: Phone-like pattern in the header to the right of the vendor name (typical vendor contact placement).

vendor_email.reason: Email address appears in the header area beneath the phone number; normalized to lower-case.

vendor_website.reason: Web address appears beneath the email in the header. Normalized to include a URL scheme for consistency.

recipient_name.reason: Under the 'Bill To' label on the left of the invoice details box, the first line lists the billed party name 'Smith Enterprises'.

recipient_address.reason: Address block under 'Bill To' contains street and city/state/ZIP lines; mapped as recipient address.

recipient_contact.reason: No explicit recipient contact person, phone, or email is present in the 'Bill To' block beyond the company name and address.

document_title.reason: Prominent large text 'Invoice' at the top-left of the document used as document-level title.

invoice_number.reason: Label 'Invoice # 12345' in the Invoice Details box at top-right of the pale blue block; numeric identifier extracted.

invoice_date.reason: Label 'Invoice date 08/01/2024' in the Invoice Details box; normalized to ISO-8601 format.

due_date.reason: Label 'Due date 08/31/2024' in the Invoice Details box; normalized to ISO-8601 format.

terms.reason: Label 'Terms Net 30' visible in the Invoice Details box; mapped to payment terms text.

value.reason: First row of the product/services table lists 'Stone work' under Description, '3.4' under Qty/Hrs, '$125' under Rate and '$425' under Amount; proximity to table headers confirms mapping.

Second table row shows multiline description 'Mulching, weeding, planting', '3' in Qty/Hrs, '$75' rate and '$225' amount; mapped by column alignment under headers 'Product/Services', 'Qty/Hrs', 'Rate', 'Amount'.

items.reason: Table under 'Product/Services | Qty/Hrs | Rate | Amount' contains two line items. Quantities and monetary values are parsed from the numeric and currency-formatted cells; currency inferred as USD from '$' symbol.

item_structure.reason: Template inferred from table columns: each line-item contains a description, numeric quantity, a monetary rate, and a monetary amount. Normalized types convert currency strings to numeric USD values.

subtotal.reason: Label 'Subtotal' in totals area with value '$650.00' to the right; numeric value extracted and normalized.

discount.reason: Line labeled 'Discount' shows '-$65.00'; the negative monetary amount is preserved and normalized to numeric -65.00.

tax_amount.reason: Line 'Tax 8.5%' shows monetary value '$49.73' in the totals area; extracted and normalized as numeric amount.

tax_rate.reason: Label 'Tax 8.5%' indicates the tax percentage; percentage symbol removed and value represented as numeric percent.

total.reason: Prominent 'Total' label at bottom right shows final amount '$634.73'; numeric value extracted and normalized.

currency.reason: Currency symbol '$' appears next to all monetary values in the document; normalized to ISO code 'USD'.

pay_to.reason: No 'Pay To' or bank/payment recipient section is present on this document.

account_name.reason: No account name or bank account holder information visible on the invoice.

account_number.reason: No bank account number or 'Account No.' label detected on the document.

payment_instructions.reason: No supplementary payment instructions or notes (e.g., wire/ACH instructions) found in the footer or body.

document_id.reason: No separate internal document id or file id is present beyond the invoice number (invoice_number is captured separately).

logo_present.reason: There is a small decorative graphic/triangle in the top-right header area; while not a full company logo, a visual graphic is present in the header.

notes.reason: No footer notes, terms beyond 'Net 30', or additional disclaimers are visible on the document.
